articles.description: England all-rounder Moeen Ali has reversed his decision to retire from Test cricket at the end of the 2021 summer to join the England roster for the first two Tests of the Ashes 2023. Moeen was asked to consider a potential call-up, as Jack Leach will miss th…

articles.title: Durand Cup 2023 to start from August 3; will have two new host cities - Khel Now
articles.description: Durand Cup 2023 is all set to commence from the 3rd of August and will be played across four cities.
